means: 不能逾越的，不能克服的

sentence.Network_en: The difficulties that confront us seem insuperable.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们面临的困难似乎是不可克服的.

sentence.Network_en: It'should not, however, pose an insuperable barrier to environmental standing.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 在环境起诉权这个问题上不应该设置不可逾越的障碍.

sentence.Network_en: They constituted a near - insuperable obstacle to the besieging infantry.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们就会形成围城步兵几乎不可逾越的障碍.

PerfectNetExp.abs: insulateinsuperable 不能制胜的, 不能克服的insuperable 不可避免的
没有不能克服的(insuperable)困难,因此我们必须以乐观的态度面对未来.(confront...with)No difficulty is insuperable so we must confront the future withoptimism.
不可逾越 impassable不可逾越 insuperable不可逾越 insurmountable
ambush 伏击某人insuperable adj. 不能超越的；不能克服的superfluous 多余的，冗余的，过剩的 redundant 冗余的，多余的，过剩的.

list.abs: insuperable odds ; insuperable heroes ., 不可逾越的差距 ; 无敌的英雄.
The deep river was an insuperable barrier to those who could not swim ., 这条深深的河对不会游泳的人是一个难以逾越的障碍.
The deep river was an insuperable barrier to those who could not swim ., 对不会游泳的人来说 , 这条深河是无法超越的障碍.
The deep river was an insuperable barrier to those who could not swim ., 这条深深的河对不会游泳的人是一个难以逾越的障碍.
insuperable odds ; insuperable heroes ., 不可逾越的差距 ; 无敌的英雄.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the general sense 'invincible'): from Old French, or from Latin insuperabilis, from in- 'not' + superabilis (from superare 'overcome')

entry.tran: 不能克服的;无法逾越的
entry.def: A problem that is insuperable cannot be dealt with successfully.

example.tran: 谈判过程中难以克服的障碍

means.word_mean: 2. incapable of being surmounted or excelled;

auth_sentence.content: They took on an immense, probably insuperable challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content: They took on an immense, probably insuperable challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They took on an immense, probably insuperable challenge.

auth_sentence.content: Weight is not an insuperable handicap, especially for heavyweights.
auth_sentence.res_content: Weight is not an insuperable handicap, especially for heavyweights.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Weight is not an insuperable handicap, especially for heavyweights.

auth_sentence.content: Three hundred thousand fighting men...all invincible soldiers, and appointed with armes insuperable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Three hundred thousand fighting men...all invincible soldiers, and appointed with armes insuperable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Three hundred thousand fighting men...all invincible soldiers, and appointed with armes insuperable.

sentences.cn: 在看似无法扭转的逆境中取得的胜利
